CustomField.description: Controls how the Email Agent sends replies AutoRespond sends the LLM reply text automatically as an email reply ReviewAndSend requires the LLM to explicitly call the send_email capability and enables HITL approval multi-step enrichment and conditional sending RouteOnly classifies and enriches records with no outbound email reply and is used for spam filtering internal routing and ops workflows
CustomField.inlineHelpText: AutoRespond auto-sends LLM reply ReviewAndSend requires LLM to call send_email and supports HITL and conditional send RouteOnly classifies and routes with no email reply
CustomField.label: Email Reply Mode
